articles.title: rstats AOC Leaderboard
articles.description: An Advent of Code Leaderboard for the #rstats community sorted by total stars and average time to complete.
articles.contents:
Last updated: 2022-12-20 00:22:18 EST
About
This leaderboard sorts by total number of stars and then by mean time between part one and part two of the puzzles.
The goal is to de-emphasize the effect of starting the puzzle closer to the midnight EST release time in favour of an efficient solution for part two (generally the harder of the two puzzles).
In an ideal world I’d have liked to calculate time from when you first download the input or open the puzzle description page, but unfortunately that is not tracked!
If you have any questions, please send me a DM on Twitter or Mastodon.
Leaderboard

articles.title: rstats AOC Leaderboard
articles.description: An Advent of Code Leaderboard for the #rstats community sorted by total stars and average time to complete.
articles.contents:
Last updated: 2022-12-20 00:22:20 EST
About
This leaderboard sorts by total number of stars and then by median time between part one and part two of the puzzles.
The goal is to de-emphasize the effect of starting the puzzle closer to the midnight EST release time in favour of an efficient solution for part two (generally the harder of the two puzzles).
In an ideal world I’d have liked to calculate time from when you first download the input or open the puzzle description page, but unfortunately that is not tracked!
If you have any questions, please send me a DM on Twitter or Mastodon.
